mapper.select: select a.id, test_result, "describe", create_by, create_time, test_case_Id, b.name create_by_name from "test_case_exec" a join "user" b on b.id = a.create_by where a.test order by a.id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "test_case_exec" (test_result, "describe", create_by, create_time, test_case_Id) VALUES ('${testResult}', #{describe}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{testCaseId})
